name: Examination Chambers (itch)
description:
A Steam-Key is provided with every purchase of the game on itch.io.

In this short narrative puzzle adventure, you play as a tester who has to overcome increasingly harder logic puzzles.

Room by room, your actions will be commented on by a test supervisor. Place different sizes of cubes on the corresponding buttons in first person to solve logic-gate-like riddles.

Playtime on your first run may be around 15-20 Minutes. In succeeding playthroughs, you can challenge yourself with proceeding through the game as fast as possible and even enjoy the party mode.

Convert small cubes to a big cube and the other way around, place the cubes on the correct buttons to figure out the challenges.

Want to know how the development went? Watch this video in which you'll see the game go from prototype to full game.

Have fun!
